title: The Yen Carry Trade Unwind

context.market_environment: Global markets are panicking as the JPY carry trade begins to unwind rapidly.
context.recent_price_behavior: Parabolic drop in USD/JPY after BOJ rate hike and soft US jobs data.
context.sentiment: Pure fear. Forced liquidations across global equity markets.
context.volatility: Extreme. Spreads widening and price jumping 50 pips per candle.

decision_prompt: Price has dropped 5% in 48 hours. It's hitting a major multi-year support level. Do you bet on a bounce?

choices.label: LONG
choices.description: Mean reversion. The RSI is at 10 on the 1H chart.

choices.label: SHORT
choices.description: Don't catch the knife. The deleveraging has only just begun.

choices.label: WATCH
choices.description: Preserve capital. Wait for a volatility contraction.

title: Arm Holdings: The Chip IPO

context.market_environment: Post-IPO quiet period has ended. The stock is the new 'AI darling'.
context.recent_price_behavior: Stock has been flat after the IPO pop, forming a tight 4-week base.
context.sentiment: Optimistic. Institutional allocation is starting sweep the bid.
context.volatility: Low but increasing on the breakout attempt.

decision_prompt: Stock clears its IPO day high of $65 on heavy volume. Do you take the trade?

choices.label: LONG
choices.description: High-handle breakout. Stocks often trend hard after clearing IPO supply.

choices.label: SHORT
choices.description: Fade the hype. IPOs are notorious for double-top failure.

choices.label: WATCH
choices.description: Wait for a retest of the $65 level as support.

title: Meta: Year of Efficiency Gap

context.market_environment: Meta has pivoted to cost-cutting after the 2022 Metaverse bloodbath.
context.recent_price_behavior: Magnificent recovery from $90. Currently sitting at $250 after a series of earnings gaps.
context.sentiment: Relief. Institutional trust is returning to the leadership.
context.volatility: Steady upward grind with low-volume pullbacks.

decision_prompt: Price pulls back to the 20-day Moving Average for the first time in 3 weeks. Do you add?

choices.label: LONG
choices.description: Trend continuation. Moving average bounces are high-probability in strong regimes.

choices.label: SHORT
choices.description: The rally is overextended. Look for a deeper correction to the 50 MA.

choices.label: WATCH
choices.description: Wait for a price reversal candle (e.g., Hammer) at the MA.

title: Gold: The Silent Sovereign

context.market_environment: Geopolitical tensions and central bank buying are pushing Gold to the brink.
context.recent_price_behavior: Gold has been stuck under $2070 for 3 years. It is currently testing $2100.
context.sentiment: Bullish but cautious. Traders have been 'faked out' at this level many times.
context.volatility: Moderate. Tight range preceding the breakout.

decision_prompt: Gold closes a 4H candle at $2150 with a clean breakaway gap. Do you enter?

choices.label: LONG
choices.description: 3-year base breakout. This is a massive structural shift.

choices.label: SHORT
choices.description: Another false breakout. Central banks will suppress price.

choices.label: WATCH
choices.description: Wait for a throwback to the $2070 'old ceiling'.
